documentation-admin-description: Manage the templates used for the creation of documents.
documentation-templates-description: In this section you there are all the templates for creating documents, You can create, edit or remove templates.
name: Name
no-templates-subtitle: No template found for this table, try changing your filters or try again later.
general-description: Please indicate fill in with required information. You can select some additional info to include in the template.
allow-changes-info: Select if chapters and steps can be edited (add/edit/remove) by the analyst
free-text-description: This is a free text for general information about a document.
template-application-description: This is a application reference by a document.
recap-description: This is a recap of the entered information. Please read carefully before continuing.
approver-description: Please indicate the number of approval steps and the default approvers for each step
chapters-description: Please indicate the chapters for this template. For each chapter it is necessary to define a name and a description
chapter-description-placeholder: Provide a description of the chapter
